688780.name: Taras Bulba and platforms of Hoolion
688780.description:
Old-school bloody 2d-shooter!

Features

  • A lot of monsters, thousands of monsters!
  • Big auto-generated tangled maze with many paths and beautiful backgrounds and customizeable generation seed
  • A lot of searching, there is no linear running in single direction
  • Three difficulty levels
  • Balanced weapon (every weapon is useful)
  • Normal save/load at every place, no checkpoints
  • Oldschool engine, game can run on Celeron-600 with WinXP
688780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
